name: Operation Annihilation
description:
The introduction of a new virus caused chaos around the world, leading 90% of the world’s population to die, whether it is because of the virus or by the hands of others. The remaining 10% was able to hide themselves from the world until the situation settles down. Several years have passed now and the survivors began building their own society.  But, are their society right?

You play as Hannah, who must enter the the Alphas' territory to kill them one-by-one. Be sure to not get caught lest your mission has been compromised.
